title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crispy, add garlic briefly.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Combine hot spaghetti with pancetta and egg-cheese mixture quickly.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.
